# Python dependencies for security scanning scripts
#
# Install with: pip install -r requirements.txt
# Requires: Python 3.8+
#
# Used by:
# - .github/scripts/acknowledge-findings.py (YAML parsing, baseline management)
# - .github/scripts/generate-security-report.py (YAML parsing)

# YAML parsing (required)
# Pinned to specific version for stability and security
PyYAML==6.0.2
